definition: to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven

sentences.english: Palmer knows that Drazen is holding Kimberly and wants him dead.
sentences.chinese: 帕默知道德拉赞一伙捉住了金姆，并且想要他的命。

sentences.english: Meanwhile Zamparini has also confirmed for the umpteenth time that Amauri is extremely close to joining Juve.
sentences.chinese: 同时赞帕里尼再次确认阿毛里离尤文越来越近了。

sentences.english: Although has studied the poems and songs, actually cannotapprove to teacher the love.
sentences.chinese: 虽学过了诗词歌赋，却赞不完对老师的爱。

sentences.english: He seems to be friends with DeRozan and Lowry.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎和德罗赞以及洛瑞是朋友。

sentences.english: The DJ praised that he still looks very young and handsome like Chor Lau Heung.
sentences.chinese: 主持人又赞他仍像楚留香那样年青及英俊。

sentences.english: "Amauri will not score against us, " Zamparini said.
sentences.chinese: “阿毛里不会对我们取得进球，”赞帕里尼说到。

sentences.english: The BOSS karaoke Zan falling demand analysis and commoner career.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉赞各BOSS掉落及其布衣职业需求分析。

sentences.english: Bronx zoo is fine, Botanical Gardens is great, for males and females.
sentences.chinese: 布朗克斯动物园很棒，植物园也很赞，适合男女参观。

sentences.english: Jack bursts out the back door of the van and kills the guards.
sentences.chinese: 杰克从车后门闯了出来，杀死了德拉赞父子的护卫们。

sentences.english: There are wonderful old towns, castles and museums to visit.
sentences.chinese: 那里有很赞的老城镇，城堡和博物馆供你参观。

sentences.english: But no need to insist that both Guru Chen's poem and mine in praise of the Dragon King be included.
sentences.chinese: 不过，不必坚持一定要同时用陈上师及我的赞龙王诗。

sentences.english: The truck was trundling along the escarpment of the Zambesi valley.
sentences.chinese: 卡车沿着赞比西山谷的绝壁缓缓行进。

sentences.english: After work driver Ramzan comes home.
sentences.chinese: 下班后，司机拉姆赞回到家。

sentences.english: Lunzan style evolvement in pre-four history works is closely contacted with the era disputation vogue.
sentences.chinese: 前四史论赞文体演变与时代论议风潮密切相关。

sentences.english: Since it is impossible mission, why he try to do it ? Never quit , just do it. That's the point.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有个桥段是用过的，阿汤哥的那个团队真心赞。

sentences.english: Someone asked the candidate whether he'd vote to cut our taxes.
sentences.chinese: 有人问侯选人他会投票赞减税。

definition: to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
(slang) to cheer sb on/to show one's support/("call" is pronounced approximately like English "call")
Tom Thumb (small person in folk tales)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
(Internet slang) to form a hand heart using one's thumb and forefinger (or by using both hands)
to praise/to speak highly of/to commend
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
